title: Introduction to Programming
description: Learn the basics of programming using Python. This course covers fundamental concepts such as variables, control structures, and functions.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: A comprehensive course that teaches you how to build websites from scratch using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Data Science with R
description: Dive into data analysis and visualization using R. This course is designed for those who want to explore data science techniques.

title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: An introduction to machine learning concepts and algorithms. Learn how to build predictive models using Python.

title: Digital Marketing Essentials
description: Understand the key principles of digital marketing, including SEO, social media, and content marketing strategies.
